# Value calculation modes

**API Collection**

These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAKeyframeAnimation/calculationMode] property.

## Constants

- **linear**: Simple linear calculation between keyframe values.
- **discrete**: Each keyframe value is used in turn, no interpolated values are calculated.
- **paced**: Linear keyframe values are interpolated to produce an even pace throughout the animation.
- **cubic**: Smooth spline calculation between keyframe values.
- **cubicPaced**: Cubic keyframe values are interpolated to produce an even pace throughout the animation.

## Constants

- **Rotation Mode Values**: These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAKeyframeAnimation/rotationMode] property.
